Package net.sf.freecol.client.gui.plaf

Class FreeColBrightPanelUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.PanelUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicPanelUI
          • net.sf.freecol.client.gui.plaf.FreeColBrightPanelUI

  • public class FreeColBrightPanelUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicPanelUI
    Draw the "image.background.FreeColBrightPanel" resource as a tiled background image. BrightPanel is intended to provide a lighter background than the default panel, and is used for panels that might contain icons and text annotations, for example, many of the subpanels in the ColonyPanel.
